title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: At a point, my own orientation be say... Somtin happens for somtin to happen and if somtin no happen, then notin go happen so brotherly's, na one brother post way complain about selling him BTC @ $25K way him buy am @ $20K and been expect to sell am at $100K but due to family issues and him financial problems, him decide to sell am @ da price of $25K after holding the coins for around 1yr +. No be say na him Church mind him take sell the coin oh but bcos of extremely cause of financial problems make am sell am. To read more about this matter check on https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466441.msg62829829#msg62829829But to my own point here my fello Nigerians, abeg, on no accounts of problems at hand way go make u sell ur BTC or any coins at any auction price way no from ur mind due to a current Financial problem.Make u just relax, dem say tomorrow get belle so make una relax cos problems way ¬†dey ahead way supposed make u sell ur BTC or alt coins dey ahead dey com. So no rush but I pray make we always live to witness and sells our BTC or alt coins by ourselves without being on pressures.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Yes we know say tomorrow get belle but e go get the type of problem you go face for this life you no go get another choice but to abort that belle by selling off your BTC to solve the brother. For anybody like that , him supposed happy day him even get sumtin to sell use solve him problem. What if him no get BTC anywer at all to sell how him for do.But if na unto person wey no get scong problem, as In problem him fit avoid , na dat kind matta I fit advise day as e stand now no reason to sell your BTC cos currently lik dis BTC price don test $26k mark twice just dis few days and that mark area na important resistance point way be say any breakthrough that resistance na sokoto straight up price fit reach around $30k again¬† and you know wetin that one com mean nah, by December e fit jump reach 35k+. So avoid temptation to sell for now if your problem no be life threatening one.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Bro, you talk well for this matter but you know say sometimes we suppose do the needful, you know say without life human beings no get hope at all but with life human beings get plenty hope, e dey easy to talk say make we no sell our coins but e dey hard to keep to that words, again you know say there are difference between problem and problems, imagine say you lose your job unexpectedly and between one week your wife burn twins and you get about 1 million naira for your Bitcoin wallet, abi you go live am go beg from people? No nah, at least you suppose do the needful, because some time we are suppose to make a bad decision and you know it, so even if you never ready to sell your coins nah just for you to close one of your eye and click the sell button, maybe when you get new job you open the both eyes and accumulate more coins. Anyway e go too good if problem no go reach person for like one year so that person go fit accumulate more coins.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: In as much as I understand perfectly what you mean, I will not completely agree with you on the comment you made on ,no matter the problem one faces, he or she should not sell his or her Bitcoin or altcoin for what ever reason..Look brotherly, life is deeper than what you and I can see, never take anything in this life too serious, because nothing is as important as the life itself, imagine having money in Bitcoin and you are at the point of death in the hospital, and the doctors require the same money to save your life, will you on your dying bed tell your family that on no account should they sell your Bitcoin? That's plain stupidity if you ask me ..We invest/save money, not just for future profits, but that when ever we are in trouble and they is no other way to go about it, the same money we saved or invested , will come around and save us as long as we have access to it ..Now , this is not me encourage us to go sell our Bitcoin on every little issues that arises, No, all I am saying is, don't die saving Bitcoin,¬† it is only the alive and healthy, that can sell Bitcoin, and still buy it back later.
